title: The week that proved we're more liberal about everything... except extra-marital affairs and Paul Hollywood
text:
It’s not often we can congratulate ourselves on anything these days, what with the bear-baiting in the Commons, the cock-fighting in the Cabinet and the scandal of Mike Bushell’s incomprehensible survival on Strictly.

But here goes; Britain has reached Peak Permissiveness. Isn’t that wonderful? Our social attitudes couldn’t be more gloriously liberal if we wore flowers in our hair and razed Bicester Village to create an anarcho-syndicalist utopia.

We may be famous the world over for our stiff-upper-lip (no not you, Harry and Meghan, obvs), stoicism and Four Weddings and a Funeral-style emotional constipation. Other nations may see our food, bibulousness and Brexit omnishambles and snort with...
description: It’s not often we can congratulate ourselves on anything these days, what with the bear-baiting in the Commons, the cock-fighting in the Cabinet and the scandal of Mike Bushell’s incomprehensible survival on Strictly.
